short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Credentials management system for Bakkah company

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bakkah Credentials Management System (CMS) Is a Credentials manager that helps you to login to your saved credentials using the extension,
Once you save your credentials through the Bakkah CMS website, CMS Extensions allows you to automatically fill the passwords with ease.

All you need is just login to the extension using your CMS password after that the extension will show the password filling suggestions that you can use on the website.
With Bakkah Credentials Management System you can manage your credentials securely with two factor authentication setting enabled.
You don’t have to worry about how you store and manage your credentials now you have a centralized system where you store and manage all passwords easily.
Bakkah Extensions follow the rules that exist in CMS website so you can control and track your login information.

All your passwords are now available through the extensions, and you don’t have to reset or forget the password.
You must memorize only the login information to the Bakkah CMS and Bakkah CMS will automatically fill the passwords for all websites.

We keep your information secure with multi layers of security to ensure the most secure way to manage your credentials.
 For more information and latest updates about Bakkah CMS you can find us at www.bakkah.com or through the email it@bakkah.net.sa
